headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces June 30, 2025 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1 today reported preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $2,001.4 billion, an increase of 3.0% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $8.3 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net outflows were $1.5 billion and money market net outflows were $10.6 billion. AUM was positively impacted by favorable market returns which increased AUM by $58 billion. FX and reinvested distributions increased AUM by $4.8 billion. Preli
